text: Pratibha Singh Baghel (born 4 January) is an Indian film singer based in Bollywood.http://www.in.com/pratibha-singh-baghel/profile-224839.html After appearing on a music reality show, she lent her voice to feature films including: Issaq, Bollywood Diaries, Shorgul , Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhaniya, Zid and Baba Ramsaa Peer. ==Achievements== Baghel won the Mangeshkar Alankaran Award in 2008, National Classical Vocal, and was the top finalist of SaReGaMaPa challenge 2009 and the winner of Shankar Mahadevan's Gharana. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people
title: Pratibha Baghel
